Question.Subject: How do I know when it will be delievered? (online ordering)?
Question.Content: Well I would like to buy this bed sheet. The website (copy & paste) is: http://www.thejunglestore.com/Animal-Gifts-Party-Favors-And-Wild-Theme-Merchandise/Zebra-Print-Bed-In-A-Bag-Set But the problem is: Is this website safe? And how do i know when it will be delivered. I can't find when it's going to be delivered. Please help.
Question.ChosenAnswer:
Read this for shipping details
http://www.thejunglestore.com/Shipping-Information
You will find this on their website under 'Customer Services' tab

Answer.Content:
Read this for shipping details
http://www.thejunglestore.com/Shipping-Information
You will find this on their website under 'Customer Services' tab
